name: Visit Mars in 360º Panoramic VR
description:
Welcome! Ready to Visit Mars in 360º Panoramic VR? Explore around, zoom in and out, enjoy the automatic view or use the manual mode to explore every little rock! Also provides support for gyroscope control! Extreme high quality spherical photography provided direclty from the Spirit and Opportunity rovers from the surface of plalnet mars!

Now with 8 different sites to visit! More coming soon!

Enjoy!

An app by The Silicon Valley One Man Army - An Independent Developer
